name: Bun Bun's Run
description:
Short puzzle game where you get the rabbit to the carrot with the help of some bears.

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with the theme "Joined together". All characters have their movement tied together.

Art assets were bought from below creators.

www.gamedevmarket.net/member/justtodraw/

www.gamedevmarket.net/member/segel2d/

Music is a cropped part of a royalty free soundtrack I bought. 

https://soundtrackloops.com/shop/genre/download-royalty-free-dreamy-guitars-loops/
